class_notes: Prerequisite: Ling 201 or Ant 203 or equivalent transfer credit.
course_description: This course investigates word formation (morphology) and sentence structure (syntax) in the world's languages.
prerequisites: LING 201 or LING_OX 201 or ANT 203 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
